heroes.name: npc_dota_hero_chaos_knight
heroes.bio_loc:
作为一名被上千个世界中无数战斗洗礼过的战斗大师，混沌骑士来自一个遥远的上层位面，在那里，宇宙的基本法则都能被直接感知到。在所有的法则中，混沌是最古老且最不知疲倦的——永无休止的搜寻着被他称为“光”的存在。很久以前，“光”违抗初始之契约离开了起源的世界，在其他世界开始了他的旅途。现在混沌骑士在一个个位面之间穿梭，无论到哪里，他永远都在搜寻然后抹杀“光”的存在，将其无数次的抹杀，然后进入下一个位面继续他的搜索。

带着自己的铁甲战马“天劫”，带着疯狂的暴怒冲进战场，从宇宙的混乱中吸取力量。他就是混沌在物理位面的化身，并在有需要的时候他会召唤其他位面的自己，这群黑暗骑兵的齐冲如同自然之力一般无法阻挡。只有当一个世界中所有“光”的存在都被彻底消灭，他的搜寻才会结束。混沌骑士的铁蹄所到之处，死亡随之同行。
heroes.hype_loc: 混沌骑士独自成军。他可以召唤一队骑兵复制体粉碎敌人的防御工事，如果有敌人现身，他将现实撕裂，把他和他的幻象大军拉到目标身前，然后残酷的战棍会如同暴雨般落在目标的头上。

abilities.name: chaos_knight_chaos_bolt
abilities.desc_loc: Throws a mysterious bolt of energy at the target unit. It stuns for a random duration and deals random damage.
abilities.lore_loc: Even Chaos Knight cannot predict this manifest of unholy energy.
notes_loc: The stun duration and damage values dealt are inversely related.
Nearby illusions will mimic the cast animation.
abilities.shard_loc: Causes Chaos Bolt to create a Phantasm illusion to attack the target. This illusion deals %illusion_damage_reduction_pct%%% less damage.
facets_loc:
混乱之箭打击目标后一分为二，额外眩晕%bounce_range_pct%%%施法距离内的一个敌人，并对另一个敌人造成伤害。以英雄优先。分裂后只打击到一个敌人的话总是会造成眩晕。

额外目标不会产生魔晶幻象。

abilities.name: chaos_knight_reality_rift
abilities.desc_loc: Teleports Chaos Knight, any illusions he has, and the target unit to a point along the line between him and the target. Reduces armor of the enemy unit for %duration% seconds.
abilities.lore_loc: Armageddon rides between the planes, bringing Chaos Knight to his victim wherever he may hide.
notes_loc: Chaos Knight and the target unit are made to face each other, and Chaos Knight and his phantasms are issued an attack order against the target.
abilities.shard_loc: Allows Reality Rift to be cast on any enemy hero that is within 1200 range of you or one of your illusions. Gathers all of your illusions and your hero and teleports them to the target enemy.
facets_loc: 实相裂隙除了平常效果外，还有均等几率施加破坏、缴械或沉默，持续时间为基础负面效果时间的%additional_debuff_duration_percent%%%。

abilities.name: chaos_knight_chaos_strike
abilities.desc_loc: Chaos Knight and his illusions' attacks have a chance to deal a critical strike of varying strength with bonus lifesteal. Lifesteal from creeps is reduced.
abilities.lore_loc: Chaos Knight's unwieldy power bludgeons those who stand before him, crushing the thickest of armors.

abilities.name: chaos_knight_reins_of_chaos
abilities.desc_loc: Whenever illusions of Chaos Knight are created, there is a %bonus_illusion_chance%%% chance that an additional %bonus_illusion_count% extra illusion will spawn.

abilities.name: chaos_knight_phantasm
abilities.desc_loc:
Summons several phantasmal copies of the Chaos Knight from alternate dimensions. The phantasms are illusions that deal %outgoing_damage_tooltip%%% damage, but take %incoming_damage_tooltip%%% damage.
DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
abilities.lore_loc: Drawing on his battles fought across many worlds and many times, phantasms of the Chaos Knight rise up to quell all who oppose him.
notes_loc: Removes most negative buffs from Chaos Knight.
Chaos Knight is invulnerable for %invuln_duration% seconds when casting, allowing him to dodge stuns and damage.
abilities.scepter_loc: Creates an illusion of allied heroes globally. Creates an additional illusion for Chaos Knight as well.

facets.description_loc: 实相裂隙除了平常效果外，还有均等几率施加破坏、缴械或沉默，持续时间为基础负面效果时间的{s:bonus_additional_debuff_duration_percent}%。
facets.name: chaos_knight_irrationality

facets.description_loc: 混沌骑士在打造中立物品时可以选择下一级的宝物。
facets.name: chaos_knight_facet_fundamental_forging

facets.description_loc: 混乱之箭在击中目标后一分为二，额外对一个敌人造成眩晕，再对另一个敌人造成伤害。
facets.name: chaos_knight_cloven_chaos

abilities.name: chaos_knight_fundamental_forging
abilities.desc_loc: 混沌骑士打造中立物品时，他的%trinket_options_next%个宝物选项是下个等级，而%trinket_options_current%个选项是当前等级。不能保证他能保留当前宝物。当打造等级为最高时，所有选项都是该级的。

new_abilities.name: chaos_knight_reins_of_chaos
new_abilities.desc_loc: 混沌骑士产生幻象时都会有%bonus_illusion_chance%%%几率额外产生%bonus_illusion_count%个幻象。
